name: ESTRANGER
description:
An interactive experience played only with your ears. Explore the island, get lost between sounds and roam around. There's no aim, no highscore.

Estranger is a student project of the University of Arts Zurich, Focus Game Design.

Created by:

Nicola Kazimir, Charles Roberge, Dominik Stettler, Dominic Sutter

Professor: Beat Suter

ZHdK Gamedesign
